attributes.additional_details:
Introducing Finn’s law part two again. 
To help Prevent and stop animal abuse and neglect. 
Tougher sentencing to the abuser and banned for owning a animal ever again.
attributes.background:
Push for Finn’s law part two. 
Tougher sentencing for animal cruelty and neglect and a ban on having animals ever again.

rejection.details:
People can already be banned from owning animals if they are found guilty of animal cruelty. 

You could start a new petition asking for an increase to the minimum sentence for animal cruelty, if that's what you'd like to happen. You can find out more about the current sentences and recent plans for them to be changed here: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/research-briefings/cbp-8612/

You may wish to sign this petition: 

Introduce a minimum sentence of 10 years for animal abusers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333132
